channel.title: Problems with hosting on a laptop..?
channel.description: What are the problems with hosting my server on a laptop? People say you can't do it but why? My laptop has 3 gig of RAM and 250gb harddrive yet my desktop has a small but ok 1 gig of RAM and 150 gig harddrive both running windows, i mean is hosting on my laptop better? or my desktop..?

item.title: Problems with hosting on a laptop..?
item.dc:creator: @Czar_y2k Czar y2k
item.description:
@Czar_y2k wrote:

[quote=“Lewis), post:8, topic:324929”][quote author=Czar y2k link=topic=421287.msg3094070#msg3094070 date=1263136214]

people dony like hosting on laptops because if theres no activity to a certain point, the laptop shuts down, therefore the server shuts off.

I can turn that off though.

your telling me, theres a way to keep a laptop on 24/7? just by switching something off? if there is i would love to know how lol.
[/quote]

On windows 7 just go to power saving options.[/quote]

wheres that at lol not entirely used to windows 7 yet.

EDIT:nvm i got it too work

Read full topic
item.source: Problems with hosting on a laptop..?
